trans-unit.source: Instructs the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> not to serialize the public field or public read/write property value.
trans-unit.target: Angir at det <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>ikke til å serialisere offentlige feltet eller offentlige skrivetilgang egenskapsverdi.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SoapIgnoreAttribute class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: SoapIgnoreAttribute klassen hører til en serie med attributter som styrer hvordan <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializes eller deserializes et objekt som kodet SOAP-XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: Resulterende XML overholder delen 5 dokumenttypen World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org), "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For en fullstendig liste over lignende attributter, kan du se [attributter som kontrollen kodet SOAP serialisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> created with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: For å serialisere et objekt som en kodet SOAP-melding, må du konstruere <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>opprettet med en <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>metode i <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>klasse.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Apply the SoapIgnoreAttribute to any class member that you want the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to ignore when an instance of the class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Gjelder SoapIgnoreAttribute for et medlem med klassen som du ønsker den <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>å ignorere når en forekomst av klassen serialiseres.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: For example, you may do this when the member is used to contain metadata about the object being serialized.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel gjøre dette når medlemmet brukes til å inneholde metadata om objektet som serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker attributter [attributter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can use the word `SoapIgnore` in your code instead of the longer SoapIgnoreAttribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan bruke ordet `SoapIgnore` i koden i stedet for lengre SoapIgnoreAttribute.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapIgnoreAttribute"> </xref> klasse.
